articles.title: Amazon Music adds behind-the-scenes trivia for songs with new X-Ray features - The Verge
articles.description: Amazon is adding new X-Ray features to its music streaming service, allowing you to see extra pieces of trivia about the music you’re listening to. The feature is available in the US and UK across “tens of millions” of songs.
